newsitem.title: USA: Sports, luxury cars cited for high claim losses.
newsitem.headline: Sports, luxury cars cited for high claim losses.

text.p: Sports and luxury cars have the highest insurance losses for vehicle damage and passenger vans and station wagons the lowest, according to a study issued on Thursday by the Highway Loss Data Institute.
It said the high-performance Dodge Viper, made by the Chrysler Corp., had the worst overall collision loss among passenger vehicles.
The Viper also had the highest losses last year, said Kim Hazelbaker, senior vice president of the institute, part of the industry-supported Insurance Institute for Highway Safety.
